source.title: U.S. carried out a strike on another alleged drug-carrying boat in the Caribbean Sea, Pete Hegseth says - NBC News
source.name: NBC News

facts: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth made the statement
The strike occurred in the Caribbean Sea
It was alleged that the boat carried drugs
This is at least the third time this week such an action has been taken by the U.S.
Pete Hegseth's role as Defense Secretary

neutral.headline: U.S. Strikes Alleged Drug-Carrying Boat in Caribbean Sea
neutral.body_html: The U.S., under the direction of Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth, has struck a boat alleged to be carrying drugs within its waters in the Caribbean Sea for at least the third time this week.

conservative.headline: U.S. Strikes Alleged Drug-Carrying Boat, Third This Week
conservative.body_html: Under Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth's direction, the U.S. has struck a boat alleged to be carrying drugs in its waters within the Caribbean Sea for at least the third time this week.

liberal.headline: U.S. Strikes Alleged Drug-Carrying Boat, Third Time This Week
liberal.body_html: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth announced that the U.S. has struck a boat alleged to be carrying drugs within its waters in the Caribbean Sea for at least the third time this week.
